Flow.description: Create Renewal Opportunity & OpportunityLineItems from all Assets on a Contract. 8/6/18 - OpFocus - Adding apex flow extension. fix for assets passed to assets 4/20/18 - ers - Assignment OLI Record changed to calculate correct Asset price to 2 decimal places. 4/20/18 - ers - Included Service Address with ProdID to determine unique entries for OLI.

formulas.description: Calculate CloseDate for newly created Renewal Opportunity
formulas.name: fCloseDate

formulas.description: Restrict Opportunity Name to a maximum of 120 characters.
formulas.name: fOppName120
fTermChange
formulas.expression: IF(VALUE({!Contract_Term_Months_pl})={!objContract.ContractTerm},"Term is unchanged at "&TEXT({!objContract.ContractTerm})&" months.","Term was changed from "&TEXT({!objContract.ContractTerm})&" to "&{!Contract_Term_Months_pl}&" months.")

Flow.label: Create Renewal Opportunity from Contract

fields.name: Msg0
fields.fieldText: You cannot create a Renewal Opportunity from a {!objContract.Status} Contract!

fields.name: Msg0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot create a Renewal Opportunity from a Contract with no Active Assets!

fields.name: error0
fields.fieldText: There is no Pricebook available for a Term of {!Contract_Term_Months_pl} Months!

fields.name: error2
fields.fieldText: Please try again.

fields.name: Prompt
fields.fieldText: Please enter updated information for the Contract Renewal Opportunity.

fields.name: RenewalStart
fields.fieldText: The current Contract was set to start on {!fStartOnText}

fields.name: AccountOwner
fields.fieldText: Current Account Owner is {!vOwnerName}

textTemplates.name: ttCurrentRenewal
textTemplates.text:
This Contract has an existing Renewal Opportunity.
It was created on {!objContract.Renewal_Opp_Created_Date__c} and has
a current Opportunity Stage of {!objContract.Renewal_Opp_Stage__c}
and a Delivery Stage of {!objContract.Renewal_Opp_Delivery_Stage__c}.

textTemplates.name: ttDescription
ttEmailSubject
textTemplates.text: New Renewal Opportunity Created for {!objAccount.Name} - Contract #{!objContract.ContractNumber}

variables.description: Collection of Unique Product IDs in Asset collection
variables.name: colProdUniq
